SEARCH
Module PSP24
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network

Interface ClientInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientRMI, ClientSocket, GameFlow
public interface ClientInterface
ClientInterface defines common actions that a client can perform in a game.

  • Method Details

    • joinGame

      void joinGame(String nick) throws IOException, InterruptedException, NotBoundException
      Joins the game with the specified nickname.
      Parameters:
      nick - The nickname of the player joining the game.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an I/O error during communication.
      InterruptedException - If the thread is interrupted while waiting.
      NotBoundException - If the server is not bound or available.

    • leave

      void leave(String nick) throws IOException, NotBoundException
      Leaves the game with the specified nickname.
      Parameters:
      nick - The nickname of the player leaving the game.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an I/O error during communication.
      NotBoundException - If the server is not bound or available.

    • setAsReady

      void setAsReady(String nickname) throws IOException
      Sets the player identified by the nickname as ready.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player setting as ready.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an I/O error during communication.

    • placeCardInBook

      void placeCardInBook(int chosenCard, int rowCell, int columnCell) throws IOException
      Places a card in the player's book at the specified position.
      Parameters:
      chosenCard - The index of the chosen card to place.
      rowCell - The row position in the book where the card will be placed.
      columnCell - The column position in the book where the card will be placed.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an I/O error during communication.

    • settingGame

      void settingGame(int numPlayers, int GameID, String nick) throws IOException
      Sets up the game with the specified number of players, game ID, and player's nickname.
      Parameters:
      numPlayers - The number of players in the game.
      GameID - The ID of the game.
      nick - The nickname of the player setting up the game.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an I/O error during communication.

    • setInitialCard

      void setInitialCard(int index, String nickname) throws IOException
      Sets the initial card for the player with the specified index.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the initial card to be set.
      nickname - The nickname of the player.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an I/O error during communication.

    • setGoalCard

      void setGoalCard(int index, String nickname) throws IOException, NotPlayerTurnException
      Sets the goal card for the player with the specified index.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the goal card to be set.
      nickname - The nickname of the player.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an I/O error during communication.
      NotPlayerTurnException - If it's not the player's turn to set the goal card.

    • PickCardFromBoard

      void PickCardFromBoard(CardType cardType, boolean drawFromDeck, int pos) throws IOException
      Picks a card from the board for the player.
      Parameters:
      cardType - The type of card to pick.
      drawFromDeck - Indicates whether the card is drawn from the deck or board.
      pos - The position of the card on the board.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an I/O error during communication.

    • ping

      void ping() throws RemoteException
      Sends a ping to the server to check connectivity.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If there is an error in remote communication.

    • sendMessage

      void sendMessage(Message msg) throws RemoteException, IOException
      Sends a message to the server.
      Parameters:
      msg - The message to be sent.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If there is an error in remote communication.
      IOException

    • makeGameStart

      void makeGameStart(String nickname) throws IOException
      Notifies the server to start the game with the specified nickname.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player requesting to start the game.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an I/O error during communication.

    • reconnect

      void reconnect(String nick, int idGame) throws IOException, InterruptedException, NotBoundException
      Client asks the server to reconnect player the player to the game
      Parameters:
      nick - of the player who is trying to reconnect
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an I/O error during communication.
      InterruptedException - If the thread is interrupted while waiting.
      NotBoundException - If the server is not bound or available.
